text: Lukáš Micherda (born 29 September 1994) is a Slovak football defender who currently plays for Odeva Lipany on loan from Partizán Bardejov. ==Club career== ===1. FC Tatran Prešov=== Micherda made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Tatran PrešovMFK Ružomberok - 1. FC TATRAN Prešov 1:0 (0:0) 16.07.2016, futbalnet.sk against Ružomberok on 16 July 2016. ===Partizán Bardejov=== Micherda joined Partizán Bardejov in January 2019. On 3 August 2019 Odeva Lipany announced, that Micharda had joined the club on loan.ŠK ODEVA Lipany - Sumárne info o zmenách v kádri (doteraz ..., facebook.com, 3 August 2019 ==References== ==External links== * 1.
